ref.mixed-citation: Jin, W. T., Schuiteman, A., Chase, M. W., Li, J. W., Chung, S. W., Hsu, T. C. Phylogenetics of subtribe Orchidinae s.l. ( Orchidaceae; Orchidoideae) based on seven markers (plastid matK, psab, rbcL, trnL-F, trnH-psbA, and nuclear nrITS, xdh): Implications for generic delimitation. BMC Plant Biol. 17, 222 (2017).
